name: Don't Look Up
description:
This game is inspired by Anish Kapoor's 2007 'Untitled' piece. This game attempts to replicate my own experiences viewing this work - its emotional output and sense of purpose. The viewer is forced to contemplate a large object that protrude and recede at simultaneously. Its colours and intimidating size evoke primal feelings as it imposes itself on us.

Town assets provided by @area_730, Black Hole effect by Mikołaj Bystrzyński, Skybox by Mundus Limited

Special Thanks to GOMA for curating this art piece, and my Game Studio 2 facilitators and friends for their feedback
